title: Crazy Six (1997 Action) Communism is dead. Opportunity is in ! With Rob Lowe & Burt Reynolds 4K

sources.title: Crazy Six (1997 Action) Communism is dead. Opportunity is in ! With Rob Lowe & Burt Reynolds 4K
sources.description:
In the chaotic aftermath of communism's collapse, Billie "Crazy Six" steals from crime boss Raul, igniting a dangerous conflict that escalates when Raul retaliates against a nightclub. Billie must survive shifting alliances with rival gangster "Dirty" Mao while detective Dakota pursues all parties through the escalating confrontation.

Original title: Crazy Six
Alternative title: Wild East

Director: Albert Pyun
Writers: Albert Pyun, Ian Davis

Main cast:
Rob Lowe - Billy / "Crazy Six"
Burt Reynolds - Raul
Ice-T - Dirty Mao
Mario Van Peebles - Dakota
Ivana Miličević - Anna

Genres: Action, Crime
Release date: 27 April 1998 
Filming location: Sofia, Bulgaria


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
